body: At 5th level, a bat shaman may cast summon nature's ally as a standard action when summoning bats, and these summoned creatures gain temporary hit points equal to her druid level. This ability otherwise functions as the ape shaman ability.
name: Totemic Summons
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Class Archetypes/Druid/Druid Archetypes/Bat Shaman/Totemic Summons
